title: About Cookies
description: A cookie is a very small text file placed on an internet user's hard drive. It is generated by a web page server, which is basically the computer that operates a website.
text_excerpt: About Cookies Skip to main content toggle menu Navigation Got it Cookie FAQ's How to manage and delete cookies EU cookie law How to comply with EU cookie law About cookies   A cookie is a very small text file placed on an internet user's hard drive.
